productDescription: Perfectly unrefined 70% dark stone ground organic chocolate with a burst of raspberry essence and a puffed quinoa crunch. Amaze Bars take stone ground chocolate to another dimension by pairing incredible flavor experiences with our minimally processed, bold dark chocolate.
